channel.title: Vengeance Delay NEED HELP! and Godsword prob
channel.description: My server seems to have a vengeance delay, it would show the skull above me when i press veng (I'm using PwnScape source btw) but not say "Taste Vengeance!" But say 2 hits later it would say it and vengeance would work. What's up with this? Here's the code for my vengeance: client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; if (mage.vengon && hitDiff != 0 && !splash) { player.hitDiff = (int)(hitDiff / 1.3); // Simple math, 100 divided by 1.30, and you get 76. player.currentHealth -= (int)(hitDiff / 1.3); player.hitUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. player.updateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you. mage.vengon = false; mage.plrText = "Taste vengeance!"; // This says it in itself. mage.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; // Make sure the txt4 will update.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 02:22:06 pm[/size][hr]Also, what are the normal bonuses for a godsword? For mines to hit 72 Max hit (armadyl) it has to be in the 300s which seems kind of weird, though I haven't seen a godsword's normal bonuses. If this bonus is too much what's wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 02:40:12 pm[/size][hr]Guess nobody is in a helping mood today Lol.

item.title: Vengeance Delay NEED HELP! and Godsword prob
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

It seemed to have fixed itself just now, I cut it and pasted it back. and it worked fine

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance Delay NEED HELP! and Godsword prob
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

It is not supposed to say “Taste Vengeance!” once you cast it, it will say “Taste Vengeance!” once the player attacks you, or the spell has been correctly used, nothing is wrong that I see.

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance Delay NEED HELP! and Godsword prob
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

My server seems to have a vengeance delay, it would show the skull above me when i press veng (I’m using PwnScape source btw)
but not say “Taste Vengeance!”
But say 2 hits later it would say it and vengeance would work. What’s up with this?
Here’s the code for my vengeance:
client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
if (mage.vengon && hitDiff != 0 && !splash) {
player.hitDiff = (int)(hitDiff / 1.3); // Simple math, 100 divided by 1.30, and you get 76.
player.currentHealth -= (int)(hitDiff / 1.3);
player.hitUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you.
player.updateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you.
player.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // So the hit will append to you.
mage.vengon = false;
mage.plrText = “Taste vengeance!”; // This says it in itself.
mage.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; // Make sure the txt4 will update.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 02:22:06 pm[/size][hr]Also, what are the normal bonuses for a godsword? For mines to hit 72 Max hit (armadyl) it has to be in the 300s which seems kind of weird, though I haven’t seen a godsword’s normal bonuses.
If this bonus is too much what’s wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 02:40:12 pm[/size][hr]Guess nobody is in a helping mood today Lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Vengeance Delay NEED HELP! and Godsword prob
